thread.title: Panneerselvam has ordered removal of Chennai city police commissioner S George, sources say
thread.title_full: Panneerselvam has ordered removal of Chennai city police commissioner S George, sources say

title: Panneerselvam has ordered removal of Chennai city police commissioner S George, sources say
text: Panneerselvam has ordered removal of Chennai city police commissioner S George, sources say Panneerselvam has ordered removal of Chennai city police commissioner S George, sources say Caretaker Tamil Nadu chief minister O Panneerselvam on Thursday ordered transfer of Chennai city police commissioner S George and appointed Sanjay Arora as the new commissioner.   01.17 PM IST Caretaker Tamil Nadu chief minister O Panneerselvam CHENNAI: Caretaker Tamil Nadu chief minister O Panneerselvam on Thursday ordered transfer of Chennai city police commissioner S George . Sanjay Arora will be the new city police commissioner. Panneerselvam ordered the change after a meeting with chief secretary Girija Vaidyanathan and DGP TK Rajendran, according sources. An official order from the chief secretary or the home secretary is expected soon. The sources said the chief secretary might seek the Governor's nod before issuing the order.
